TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Posong, title = Posong, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Posong} }

S.FORM: Posong (niyaro') I Mingkok 58 a mihecaan mapatongal iPawsangli nani Seweyli kona niyaro'. I kaikor no Taytongnicong a kongkoan ko kasaniyaro' no Posong.
